column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Luke - Thanks for your review. While we respectfully disagree with your opinion ;) I'm sure we can both agree on this: Houston is fast becoming the Ramen Capital of Texas
column2: and the restaurants that do it well will continue to do it well. As far as which ramen is best
column3: as my general manager Keith likes to say
column4: it's like asking "Which diamond is the prettiest?" Choice is good
column6: Houstonians will have a bevy of choices for ramen
column7: which is vastly different from the ramen landscape just a year ago.
